source.content: For those not in #Ferguson: what questions do you still have? Are their angles/content you want explored haven't seen yet?

comment.content: @WesleyLowery I don't know a delicate way to ask this: How many white people have been involved in protests, both violent/non-violent?
@TeddieLacy protests have been majority black (as is the city/surrounding area), but there have been people of many races - including white
@WesleyLowery Have not seen much today about either of the shootings last night, esp. in regard to supposed drive-by in a locked down area
@WesleyLowery just want to say thank you for your coverage.
@WesleyLowery I'd like to know if the autopsy concluded it was death by gunshots why won't they release where the wounds were?
@WesleyLowery I'm curious to know more about the history & typical practices of St Louis County police related to other area law enforcement
@tcarmody @WesleyLowery a particularly interesting question given that St. Louis is home to this thing http://t.co/ON4jUb12xp
@tcarmody @WesleyLowery should be repository of comparative data re: crime stats, evidence-based policing, profiling. http://t.co/DbJxUh1P5l
@WesleyLowery examine the almost all white elected officials in a city with a 67% black population. They hire/fire police chief.
@WesleyLowery local friend says there is a 3 mi stretch of road with buildings all boarded up. Was the rioting damage that bad?

@WesleyLowery are the police deploying an Active Denial System?
https://t.co/KGYuF4g0XV
@WesleyLowery how are other minority groups in the community reacting? Not sure if there are Asian Americans there, but would be interested.
@WesleyLowery any idea if the family will seek a second autopsy?
@mespurge yes they will, is my understanding
(the grammar in this was terrible i'm sorry)
@WesleyLowery I expected better of you, Wes.
@WesleyLowery Please! Ain't nobody thinking about your grammar at a time like this. I'm not even thinking about my own. ;)
@WesleyLowery I think people are having some trouble distinguishing Ferguson police from the County police. That needs to be clarified.
@WesleyLowery what plan is in place when Anonymous releases the cops name? Protective custody? Armed detail?
@WesleyLowery @Only4RM Are media asking why SWAT teams are necessary?
@JJGomez127 @Only4RM Yes! Media asked the police chief several times.
@WesleyLowery One sees in photos lots of protesters holding phones, recording video I assume -- how is that & results of that being used?
@WesleyLowery Reports say FBI, DOJ investigating but they don't prosecute murder. Plz explain what fed involvement can & can't do
@WesleyLowery @jbouie breakdown of number of military vehicles/guns in county.
@WesleyLowery speak to a "looter". How does stealing/trashing innocent biz solve/prove anything? What's their mindset?
@WesleyLowery Why are the police responding the way they are? Who's calling the shots on the tactics and where is the money coming from?
@WesleyLowery It may be too narrow for a natl audience, but how this plays into local STL City-County divide & merger debate is fascinating
@WesleyLowery STL County seems to be larger and serve different functions from other county police forces or Sheriff's departments.
@WesleyLowery What do the SWAT officers have to say about all of this? Do they feel like this is a legitimate display of force?
@WesleyLowery @jbouie How much is the overtime and extra forces costing per day? How many police/swat have refused to take part?
@WesleyLowery @sarahjeong my question is, what is their endgame? Or are they just deploying a full on occupation? #greetedAsLiberators
@WesleyLowery @jbouie What do the people there want from the rest of us as they recover and work towards justice?
@WesleyLowery @jbouie I haven't seen an explanation for why Michael Brown was left in the street after the shooting.
.@MattinToledo @jbouie cops say, in part, because investigators had to pause several times because they heard gunfire
@WesleyLowery what are overall crime stats in the area? Is it a violent community? Do police generally have to draw their guns?
@WesleyLowery how n the hell can a city with blk pop of 67% have no blk leadership or representation n city government/police? Thx
@WesleyLowery what's next for the officer? Even if he isn't "guilty" or charged. Name change? Different country? Witness protection?
@WesleyLowery Why is there money for all this reaction against protest but no money for dashcams? It makes no sense.
.@mrstevenson33 part of distinction there is that county/state police are the ones helping police protests - not just Ferguson PD
@WesleyLowery People need to know who to hold accountable for what actions, and I don't think everyone's clear on that yet.
@WesleyLowery The narrative initially seemed to be that the county police were coming in to take over for smaller/compromised Ferguson PD.
@WesleyLowery @jbouie is there silence fm the Governor of MO on this? What abt state-wide civic leaders?
@WesleyLowery what is the racial history of this town? How did the cops get this way?
@Profepps @WesleyLowery Second this question--I grew up in Ferg 1974-84 and am also thinking abt how Ferg's history intertwines w/Kinloch's.
@Profepps @WesleyLowery as per interview I heard with @Locs_n_Laughs this morning it was majority white until white flight left it majority
@Profepps @WesleyLowery African American.But while pop transitioned, the town leadership, school board stayed white. Only 3 African American
@Profepps @WesleyLowery police out of 50 on the force.
@WesleyLowery Why are police threatening to arrest peaceful protesters after the chief just said they'd be left alone, if peaceful?
@WesleyLowery @jbouie How has a town that's 2/3rds black kept an overwhelmingly white power structure?
@WesleyLowery @sarahjeong Aside from visible racial homogeneity of police & city council, is there evidence/examples of ingrained racism?
@WesleyLowery Why haven't the police finished interviewing witnesses after four days?
.@DogDriverNews mix of reasons. Many don't trust local cops/haven't come forward
@WesleyLowery police talk about understanding ppl upset. Do they understand their actions aren't helping at all?!
@WesleyLowery @jbouie may be silly but what exactly is the PD blocking and keeping ppl away from? Still the QuickMart? Where MB was killed?
.@Freesus @jbouie typically blocking them from stretch where there are businesses
@WesleyLowery Why are FAA air restrictions still in place? I haven't heard of any civilians having rocket launchers & shooting helicopters?
.@honeynoir there were reports of gunshots at a police helicopter on one earlier night, police citing that. Have been some gunshots at night
@WesleyLowery is it true (i read it early on somewhere) that Police confiscated witnesses' phones for picture/video evidence? If so, were..
.@BluEyezMess that is word on street, but no confirm from PD (i haven't asked direct) and have not talked to anyone who said happend to them
@WesleyLowery Why are they wearing green camo in an urban environment?
@WesleyLowery have the police said what would make them take their riot gear and go home?
@WesleyLowery Now it seems like the county has upped the ante by bringing in armored units, SWAT squads, generally ignoring best practices
@WesleyLowery The issue that sticks out for me: Even assuming the officer shot in self-defense at first, what justifies emptying his clip?
@WesleyLowery Reasonable fear of harm has to be present for each & every shot fired. Witnesses have noted a time lapse btwn rounds of shots.
@WesleyLowery @jbouie How are the #Ferguson local politicians responding? Are people planing to run against them in next election?
@WesleyLowery were they returned? Etc etc
@WesleyLowery I'd love someone to do some deep profiling on city manager, mayor, police admin--really go through archives of local press
@WesleyLowery @fifthstarter Is there any way to fire every policeman?
@WesleyLowery under what authority are they telling protesters to leave &abandon their constitutional right to peaceful assembly? #Ferguson
@WesleyLowery Why is the reaction by authorities so different here than in CA for the #BundyRanch incident?
@LLLGeorge @WesleyLowery Nevada. But good point
@WesleyLowery What kind of organizing is happening on the ground? Are there factions or gradations of participation?
@WesleyLowery - why no media access? #Ferguson
@WesleyLowery what # protestors gather am to PM? Do crowd dynamics change? The ratio of residents:outsiders. R witnesses afraid2talk2police?
@WesleyLowery have you any statements from witnesses that claim they had video of shooting that had phones confiscated?
@WesleyLowery the police presence is now multi-agency, right? Who is running that? How our officers from other units viewing this situation?
.@WesleyLowery I'd like to know what the chain of command has been. Who made the deployment decisions? #Ferguson? County? Who? @normative
@WesleyLowery Perhaps you've already done this & I missed it, but could you explain which different police agencies are there & their roles?
@WesleyLowery @jbouie I'd like to see an exploration of the historic disenfranchisement of the black majority in Ferguson.
@WesleyLowery Why do the police keep making the choice to use swat at protests? Do they understand swat escalates the situation?
.@WesleyLowery We're getting the event-reporting, but how are these decisions being made? Need to know that for accountability. @normative
@WesleyLowery I'm actually very curious about the apparent media blackout, at least at night. How is that playing w journalists?
.@Caesar_X at night the place becomes a bit of a warzone - tear gas doesn't discriminate between protestor/rioter/reporter
@WesleyLowery I keep asking about the woman that was shot last night. Any word on her?
.@_sherylkaye_ have reached out to her directly - understanding is wound was a graze, and she is recovering
@WesleyLowery How does a city that 65+% Black get a mostly White city/police leadership--and one that's so out of control?
@WesleyLowery @sabzbrach would like more info on federal law enforcement agencies that are helping police the protest.
@WesleyLowery is anyone trying to go 1 by 1 thru the police roster to find the shooter?
@WesleyLowery I've seen black faith leaders. Where are any others? Are white pastors, like, sitting this one out?
.@Beau1u have seen a number of white clergy. black community leaders. Have not seen many electeds on the ground *where i've been*
.@WesleyLowery As far as you can tell, whose decision was it on the law enforcement side to go with this insane maximum-military approach?
@WesleyLowery what's the local tax structure & public funding been like for the last few years? How did 2008 fin. crisis effect it & whom?
@WesleyLowery what's the voter turnout been like? History of voter intimidation? Who participates in local Dem/Republican parties?
@WesleyLowery @cliotropic more reporting abt how funding for the weaponry the police are using against citizen protestors. (1/2)
@WesleyLowery home state for post 9-11 Atty General. Did Ashcroft impact militarization of police, enforcement of civil rights oversight?
@WesleyLowery Do the immense shows of force appear aimed at any behavior or act other than protest after dark (w/no official curfew)?
@WesleyLowery @cliotropic (2/2) circumstances such a show of force is used. Is it when someone (who) declares state of emergency. Or
@WesleyLowery have you seen any state legislators? Besides the one Senator. Anything from MO Senators.
@WesleyLowery who paid for all those weapons that tiny town's PD has? Who sold them?
@WesleyLowery some news outlets are interviewing folks who say the looters are coming from out of town, any idea if this is true?
@WesleyLowery @cliotropic or is it just mobilized everytime the police feel challenged in any way?
@WesleyLowery probably answered elsewhere and I just missed it but what is response from local politicians?
@WesleyLowery Circumstances surrounding the incident: where was victim going? What was he doing? How did encounter w police start?
.@ChandraWC These + officer's name are the biggest remaining unanswered questions IMO
@ChandraWC @WesleyLowery his grandmother said he was coming to visit her.... I heard.  ??
@WesleyLowery has Dorian Williams been interview by local or FBI
@LisaKBromley at this point, yes to both
@WesleyLowery @cliotropic what is the history of this dept? When my cousin was killed, turned out the dept was on SPLC watch list
@ProfKFH @cliotropic have a story coming on this
@WesleyLowery I just don't understand the overkill with the guns etc w/ police to the protesters.
@WesleyLowery how spread out (1 block, several blocks, etc) are these protests?
.@dentonitis typically all contained within a block or two. all happening within blocks of the shooting
@WesleyLowery where the hell are Rep. Lacy Clay's people in all of this?Only one statement on his website? Really?
@WesleyLowery Since we do not know the officer's name assuming no way of knowing of any previous disciplinary actions either?
.@MaximusShelby correct. No way of knowing until we have name
@WesleyLowery what's the governor saying/doing? What's happening in St Louis proper? Great tweets btw
@WesleyLowery mostly non-violent displays, if not all, going on?
.@missacolo other than some rocks thrown on late Monday night (after gas) i have seen 0 violence from protesters
@WesleyLowery Who is coordinating the police effort? Who is making the decision to show so much force?
@WesleyLowery Why does a municipal law enforcement agency have a 50-caliber machine gun mounted on top of a military grade vehicle?
@WesleyLowery Why was EMS/Coroner never called to the scene?
@boinzy had not heard that. will inquire
@WesleyLowery Have you reached out to any of the black officers on Ferguson police force? I'm interested in their perspective
@WesleyLowery have there been  marches on the police station or city council?
@WesleyLowery @chrislhayes who are the looters?  How does a moral outrage lead to destruction of property?  How does response help/hurt caus
Have police considered significant economic impact of their approach to this crisis? What are they doing to mitigate losses? @WesleyLowery
@WesleyLowery What is the MO governor doing?
@WesleyLowery would love to see an Ariel shot. I know it's hard with the "no fly" but I would love to see the view from the sky.
@WesleyLowery @chrislhayes I'd like to know how and why this police force looks like a scene from hamburger hill. Who funds that and how?
@WesleyLowery @jbouie is legal advice/activist support orgs available to protestors ?
@SwindleAla @jbouie i haven't encountered them on the ground, but doesn't mean they aren't here
@WesleyLowery how much national/international media is there? Are they taking this seriously or chasing sensation?
@WesleyLowery @chrislhayes Sorry to say this but sometimes chants and marches are not enough remember Chicago 1968 Democratic Convention
@WesleyLowery is there still a need for such an aggressive police presence at this point? I tweeted earlier #Ferguson needs a Gen Honore
@WesleyLowery how much is this militarized police response costing the City/County/State?
@WesleyLowery @chrislhayes Any Black female leadership in Ferguson? Or is this like 60s with the face of the protest mostly Black males?
@WesleyLowery Does it appear/feel like the situation is calming or becoming more tense?
@WesleyLowery I have to feel this is more than the death. It's about poverty, jobs, schools, housing. People are tired. #Psychology
@WesleyLowery what is the population in #Ferguson? How big/small off a town?
@WesleyLowery what is legality militarized police policing? Feds have to sign off on? Are Federal discussions happening around #Ferguson?
@WesleyLowery this is awesome, thank you
@WesleyLowery What about local leaders in the crowd who are emerging as important to the demonstrations? That would be a good story or two.
@WesleyLowery @chrislhayes Any talk about the Nat'l Guard or Feds coming in to break this crap up & make the local Police stand down?
@WesleyLowery @chrislhayes a day in the life of a SWAT member. What is their thought process about the (in)appropriate level of response?
@WesleyLowery @chrislhayes Wesley, you are starting to grow on me..good coverage #Ferguson
@WesleyLowery what is governor or state doing?
@WesleyLowery why was there protest(s) in Clayton? Solidarity? My memory is that Clayton was pretty white. (I left StL 25 years ago)
@WesleyLowery Is there any talk of getting an another autopsy done by a third party?
@WesleyLowery have they said if there was a bullethole found in the cop car (which may confirm the cop's story of struggle & gun going off)?
@WesleyLowery @chrislhayes Interview the rare black officer(s) and ask what they feel like right now.
@WesleyLowery what is status of any budding community organizations being formed? Any Occupy presence there either?
@WesleyLowery Who is paying for this display of 'strength'? Who is actually in control, city-wise?
@WesleyLowery What about the officer who yelled at protestors, "Bring it, f*cking animals, bring it! Is he being disciplined for incitement?
@WesleyLowery Thanks for the response, and for your coverage.
@WesleyLowery @jbouie Thank you very much.
@WesleyLowery @DogDriverNews Well yeah, but attny for key eye witness said they were stonewalled when tryin to come forward w/ info
@WesleyLowery has anyone asked why no cameras were on any of #Ferguson's officers, yet the department is utilizing military vehicles?
@WesleyLowery @blk_bk @DogDriverNews weird how people might not trust the cops right now
@ShannonIsBadAt "@WesleyLowery: .@Freesus @jbouie typically blocking them from stretch where there are businesses
@WesleyLowery okay... Thanks. Just curious about that part as it hasn't been mentioned anymore since day of shooting.

@cbrodrick @WesleyLowery Thanks, you're right.
@WesleyLowery Thanks? One moe question. Does she know what happened? Can you say?

@WesleyLowery @Beau1u isn't the congressman Lacy Clay (D)?
One of the bigger reasons for the public's response, imo. No answers, no justice, no peace. @WesleyLowery @ChandraWC
@WesleyLowery How can they be unanswered? I thought this happened in broad daylight. No one else was on the street? In the vicinity?!
@WesleyLowery thanks for your coverage

@WesleyLowery @missacolo Some would argue that because of the intense police present. Thoughts?

.@michaeltillery Yes. local PD (who shot) has no dash cams - just got grant for 2 of them. state/county PD primarily breaking up protests
@Ishfery  or...ever, tbqh. @WesleyLowery @DogDriverNews
.@tasha_paige easy answer, i'm a black man - the police
@SethKlamann I'm interested in pastors with mostly white flocks -- are they engaged, and with whom? @WesleyLowery @mattdpearce
@KatMcKinley @missacolo based on people i've talked to/what i've seen: i think that is a large part of it
.@TottenhamPub @missacolo one young man pulled a gun on cops last night. He was shot multiple times http://t.co/WVdrh9CyPj

@WesleyLowery By whose orders? Who is in charge? @michaeltillery
@WesleyLowery thanks.
@WesleyLowery @tasha_paige this is why we need diversity in the newsroom people
@WesleyLowery @tasha_paige I'm white and it's still an easy answer, the police
@WesleyLowery Thanks for your honesty. People think it's just the"poor" or "thugs" that would feel that way. It's a threat 4 all Black Men

@WesleyLowery @missacolo I have mixed feelings about it.
